title: Prosecutor Labelled Epstein's Victims As Drug Addicts, Transcript Reveals
content: At least two girls molested by Jeffrey Epstein were labelled prostitutes, drug addicts, thieves and liars by a Palm Beach County prosecutor, according to a newly released grand jury transcript from 2006.
summary: At least two girls molested by Jeffrey Epstein were labelled prostitutes, drug addicts, thieves and liars by a Palm Beach County prosecutor, according to a newly released grand jury transcript from 2006.

title: Who Is Rishi Shah, Indian-American Jailed For Rs 8,300 Crore Fraud In US
content: Rishi Shah, an Indian-American businessman, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison for a Rs 8,300 crore ($1 billion) fraud involving his advertising startup.
summary: Rishi Shah, an Indian-American businessman, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison for a Rs 8,300 crore ($1 billion) fraud involving his advertising startup.

title: Taliban Told To "Include Women" In Public Life At Their First UN Meet
content: Taliban authorities were told women must be included in public life, UN Under-Secretary-General Rosemary DiCarlo said on Monday as she defended a decision to sideline civil society groups at official talks in Doha.
summary: Taliban authorities were told women must be included in public life, UN Under-Secretary-General Rosemary DiCarlo said on Monday as she defended a decision to sideline civil society groups at official talks in Doha.

title: British Medic Peter, Who Saved Over 200 Lives In Ukraine, Dies On Frontline
content: Tributes have poured in, honoring his heroism and dedication. His organization, Project Konstantin, praised his unwavering commitment to saving lives and delivering humanitarian aid.
summary: Tributes have poured in, honoring his heroism and dedication. His organization, Project Konstantin, praised his unwavering commitment to saving lives and delivering humanitarian aid.

title: "Without Her Support...": Expert Praises US First Lady After Biden's Debate
content: Ever present by US president Joe Biden's side after his calamitous debate -- and foursquare behind him as he vowed to fight on in his reelection bid -- First Lady Jill Biden has been fighting her husband's battles from the front lines.
summary: Ever present by US president Joe Biden's side after his calamitous debate -- and foursquare behind him as he vowed to fight on in his reelection bid -- First Lady Jill Biden has been fighting her husband's battles from the front lines.

title: Steve Ballmer Is Now Richer Than Bill Gates, A First For Microsoft Employees
content: Steve Ballmer passed Bill Gates on Monday to become the sixth-richest person in the world, the first time the former chief executive officer of Microsoft Corp. has been wealthier than the company's co-founder.
summary: Steve Ballmer passed Bill Gates on Monday to become the sixth-richest person in the world, the first time the former chief executive officer of Microsoft Corp. has been wealthier than the company's co-founder.

title: Hurricane Beryl Strengthens To Category 5 Storm After Hitting Caribbean
content: Hurricane Beryl strengthened into a top-level category 5 storm late Monday after it swept across several islands in the southeastern Caribbean, dumping heavy rain and unleashing devastating winds.
summary: Hurricane Beryl strengthened into a top-level category 5 storm late Monday after it swept across several islands in the southeastern Caribbean, dumping heavy rain and unleashing devastating winds.

title: New Zealand To Bring Law That May Get Media Firms Revenue From Facebook
content: New Zealand's conservative coalition government will proceed with a bill that would make it compulsory for digital technology platforms to pay media companies for news, it said on Tuesday.
summary: New Zealand's conservative coalition government will proceed with a bill that would make it compulsory for digital technology platforms to pay media companies for news, it said on Tuesday.

title: What Anthony Blinken Said On Biden's Performance In Debate Against Trump
content: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Monday responded to criticism of President Joe Biden's performance in last week's debate, saying his policies over the past 3-1/2 years have boosted confidence in American leadership in the world.
summary: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Monday responded to criticism of President Joe Biden's performance in last week's debate, saying his policies over the past 3-1/2 years have boosted confidence in American leadership in the world.

title: Joe Biden vs Donald Trump: Important Dates In 2024 US Presidential Race
content: President Joe Biden, a Democrat, and Republican former President Donald Trump will face each other in the 2024 presidential election in what is expected to be a divisive and closely fought contest.
summary: President Joe Biden, a Democrat, and Republican former President Donald Trump will face each other in the 2024 presidential election in what is expected to be a divisive and closely fought contest.

title: US Deepening Its Relationship With India In Several Areas: Official
content: The United States is deepening its relationship with India in several key areas, a senior administration official said Monday.
summary: The United States is deepening its relationship with India in several key areas, a senior administration official said Monday.

title: Indian-American Man's Rs 8,300 Crore Fraud Scheme Shakes Top US Investors
content: An Indian-American businessman Rishi Shah, the former billionaire cofounder of Outcome Health, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison by a US court.
summary: An Indian-American businessman Rishi Shah, the former billionaire cofounder of Outcome Health, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison by a US court.

title: Joe Biden's Son Hunter Sues Fox News For Airing "Revenge Porn"
content: US President Joe Biden's son Hunter is suing right-wing Fox News for airing nude images of him in a miniseries that he claims amount to "revenge porn," court documents showed Monday.
summary: US President Joe Biden's son Hunter is suing right-wing Fox News for airing nude images of him in a miniseries that he claims amount to "revenge porn," court documents showed Monday.

title: "Serious Mistake": Netanyahu After Israel Frees Head Of Gaza Hospital
content: Israel on Monday freed the head of Gaza's biggest hospital who said he was tortured during seven months in detention, but Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu soon after criticised the release as a "serious mistake".
summary: Israel on Monday freed the head of Gaza's biggest hospital who said he was tortured during seven months in detention, but Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu soon after criticised the release as a "serious mistake".

title: "When Will Politicians...": Elon Musk Slams Kamala Harris Over Trump "Lie"
content: Social media platform X owner Elon Musk on Monday slammed US Vice President Kamala Harris for "lying" about former president Donald Trump's stance on abortion ban.
summary: Social media platform X owner Elon Musk on Monday slammed US Vice President Kamala Harris for "lying" about former president Donald Trump's stance on abortion ban.

title: "We Hope Any Country On Planet Condemns...": US On India-Pak Ties
content: Principal Deputy Spokesperson for the US Department of State, Vedant Patel reiterated the country's stand on terrorism and said that they hope that any country on the planet condemns terrorism anywhere.
summary: Principal Deputy Spokesperson for the US Department of State, Vedant Patel reiterated the country's stand on terrorism and said that they hope that any country on the planet condemns terrorism anywhere.

title: "He'll Be More...": Biden On Supreme Court Immunity Ruling In Trump Case
content: President Joe Biden warned on Monday that the US Supreme Court's landmark ruling on presidential immunity sets a "dangerous precedent" that Donald Trump would exploit if elected in November.
summary: President Joe Biden warned on Monday that the US Supreme Court's landmark ruling on presidential immunity sets a "dangerous precedent" that Donald Trump would exploit if elected in November.

title: Russian Military Says It Captured 2 More Ukrainian Villages
content: Russia's Defence Ministry said on Monday that its forces had taken control of two villages in eastern Ukraine.
summary: Russia's Defence Ministry said on Monday that its forces had taken control of two villages in eastern Ukraine.

title: 1 Killed In Shooting In US' Seattle: Cops
content: A person died in a shooting in Seattle, the US state of Washington, according to police.
summary: A person died in a shooting in Seattle, the US state of Washington, according to police.

title: Indian American Physician, 51, Pleads Guilty To Healthcare Fraud
content: A 51-year-old Indian American physician from the Chicago area has pleaded guilty to a federal healthcare fraud by billing Medicaid and private insurers for nonexistent services.
summary: A 51-year-old Indian American physician from the Chicago area has pleaded guilty to a federal healthcare fraud by billing Medicaid and private insurers for nonexistent services.
